message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but you get a decent share.  Accept this and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, let's be realistic.  I'm willing to give you a generous share considering it's my turn to propose, but this money loses value fast.  Take this deal and we both benefit.

Bob, I understand the value of time and the pressure of inflation.  But I believe we can both do better. This is a fair offer that recognizes the value of both our time and the remaining money. Let's end this game and agree to this deal.
